rooms.description: An open-plan combined living and kitchen area designed to maximize space utilization while adhering to Vastu principles. The space features a central island and is oriented to face the auspicious east.
A compact bedroom designed for rest and privacy. Vastu recommends placing bedrooms on the south side of the property; this room is aligned accordingly.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned in the north-east direction to invite positive energy.
Large windows on the east and south sides for natural lighting and adherence to Vastu orientation principles.
